name: Aaron Michael Services

service.name: General Repairs
service.description: Drywall patching, door adjustments, trim repair, and small household fixes.

service.name: Plumbing Repairs
service.description: Leaky faucets, toilet repairs, minor pipe leaks, and fixture replacements.

service.name: Electrical & Lighting
service.description: Outlet and switch replacement, light fixture installs, ceiling fans, troubleshooting.

service.name: Carpentry
service.description: Shelving, framing, stair and railing repair, cabinetry touch-ups.

service.name: Painting
service.description: Wall and ceiling painting, patch and repaint, trim finishing, touch-ups.

service.name: Accessibility Modifications
service.description: Grab bar installs, threshold modifications, ramp adjustments for safe living.

description: Aaron Michael Services provides licensed, insured handyman services across Buffalo, Amherst, Tonawanda, Kenmore and Western New York. Call 716-533-7108 for same-day scheduling.
